title: Pixel 4 XL stuck in bootup animation
content:
After using the Pixel 4 XL since yesterday I've set up G Suite mobile device management on the phone as well, to add the work mode.
I tried to use Chrome for something a few hours later and saw it didn't open properly. The screen stayed grey or it crashed when trying to open it.

So I restarted the phone and now it's stuck in the bootup animation where you see the multi-coloured "G" with a kind of loading bar below it.
It ran for ~1 hour like this and nothing happened. I tried to boot into safe mode but it didn't seem to work. I also tried playing around with the recovery mode but didn't try factory resetting yet.

I've moved multiple 2FA-methods for banking over to this phone, I don't get why it should give up on me after one day of use.
I had a Huawei Mate 10 Pro before this since its launch and not even once had a problem that made my phone unusable.

Does anyone have an idea how to get the phone going again? This is really upsetting for such an expensive piece of hardware.
